an4.98:1.1: “Mendicants, these four individuals are found in the world.
an4.98:1.3: One who practices to benefit themselves, but not others;
an4.98:1.4: one who practices to benefit others, but not themselves;
an4.98:1.5: one who practices to benefit neither themselves nor others; and
an4.98:1.6: one who practices to benefit both themselves and others.
an4.98:1.7: These are the four individuals found in the world.”
